name: Gene Thief
description:
You can steal the powers of you enemies. Well, not so much 'steal' or

even 'can'. More like 'receive' and 'do'. You do receive the powers of
your enemies.

Gene Thief is a twin-stick arena shooter where you are forced to become the enemy that hurts you.

Controls:

Move — WASD/Left Analog

Attack — ↑←↓→/Right Analog

Exit — Escape
